# `RecordingWheelPicker` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | No | Optional unique identifier to help map component replies to form messages where multiple Wheel Pickers can be present. |
| items | [`RecordingWheelPickerItem[]`](recordingwheelpickeritem-definition.md) | No | An array of options in the Wheel Picker. |
